Title: staying in the loop
This graph describes how much young men and women reach out to their parents. I notice how the title is "how involved are parents in their young adult's lives," and the data does not relate to it. I wonder why not many more people send texts because they're so easy to send. I wonder why young women generally communicate with their families more. It relates to my community or life because I am going on to college next year and staying in contact with my family is very important to me.
